text: The 1958 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1958 NCAA University Division football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. They began the season ranked 7th in the pre-season AP Poll. The team was led by ninth-year head coach Eddie Erdelatz. ==Schedule== ==References== Navy Midshipmen Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Navy Midship
title: 1958 Navy Midshipmen football team
